mean_cn: n. 鼓；圆桶；  v. 击鼓
mean_en: a musical instrument that is made with a thin layer of skin or plastic stretched over the end of a round frame and that is played by hitting the skin or plastic with sticks or with your hands
sentence: The little guy shows his talent at playing the drum.
sentence_trans: 小家伙展示了他打鼓的才能。
